description: The Abbé Rozier farm, part of the Horticulture Training and Promotion Centre, focuses on organic market gardening and sustainable development. Established in 2015, it serves as a practical training ground for students while promoting awareness of local and seasonal farming. The farm offers educational workshops for all ages, emphasizing hands-on experiences with nature, biodiversity, and healthy eating. It collaborates with various partners to enhance its educational programs and community impact.
name: La Ferme Abbé Rozier
